name: Run For Your Life 3D
description:
This prototype is the result of a university assignment where I had to create two games one must use Game Maker Studio 2 which I had no previous knowledge of how to use it before and the Unreal Engine which I had only a small amount of experience with. I think this game did turn out very well considering my lack of knowledge of the engine.

This game is about a player that must run away from a bulldozer that is destroying trees and environment. This is Run for Your Life 3D there is also a 2D version created in Game Maker Studio 2   please see my other games.

Please enjoy this prototype and have fun. Thanks for playing.
